str2: Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: From meta and noieo; to think differently or afterwards, i.e. Reconsider.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 1st Person Singular
Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Quickly, speedily. Neuter singular of tachus; shortly, i.e. Without delay, soon, or suddenly, or readily.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To make war, contend, fight, battle. From polemos; to be in warfare, i.e. To battle: -fight, war.
(a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A sword, scimitar; fig: war, piercing grief. Probably of foreign origin; a sabre, i.e. A long and broad cutlass.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
The mouth, speech, eloquence in speech, the point of a sword.
